pos_mean_info_list.mean: 涉及；使参与；包含（involve的过去式和过去分词）
包含；牵涉；使陷于；潜心于

word_group.brief_definition: 父母参与；家长参与；父母介入
外资参与；外国势力干涉
政府间介入；政府对政府的介入；政府间的牵连

bilingual.source: He denies involvement in any illegal act.
bilingual.target: 他否认参与了任何非法行为。

bilingual.source: He was arrested for his involvement in the robbery.
bilingual.target: 他因参与抢劫而被逮捕。

bilingual.source: He was arrested for his involvement in laundering money.
She was sentenced for her involvement in the robbery.
bilingual.target: 她因参与抢劫而被判刑。

bilingual.source: She was prosecuted for her involvement in the scandal.
bilingual.target: 她因参与丑闻而被起诉。

bilingual.source: Blood clotting requires the involvement of fibrin.
bilingual.target: 血液凝固需要纤维素的参与。

bilingual.source: His witting involvement in the scheme was uncovered.
bilingual.target: 他有意的参与计划被揭露了。

bilingual.source: He cannot disavow his involvement in the project.
bilingual.target: 他无法否认自己参与了这个项目。

bilingual.source: He was arrested for his involvement in illicit activities.
bilingual.target: 他因参与非法活动而被捕。

bilingual.source: They were arrested for their involvement in the conspiracy.
bilingual.target: 他们因参与阴谋而被逮捕。

list.abstract: 英 [ɪnˈvɒlvmənt] 美 [ɪnˈvɑ:lvmənt] n. 牵连，参与;加入;财政困难;牵连的事务，复杂的情况

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks to the involvement of renowned astrophysicist, Kip Thorne.
yingyinNormal.zh: 多亏了著名天体物理学家，基普索恩的参与。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, promises. Carter promised equal involvement, then shut us out of Camp David. Clinton did the same with Bosnia.
yingyinNormal.zh: 保证，卡特总统保证双方平等参与最后签协议的时候，却没叫我们波斯尼亚战争，克林顿也是如此。

yingyinNormal.en: Meaning, they may know of your involvement. What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们可能知道你也有份。你说什么？

yingyinNormal.en: They're cars, not carriages. It's a legacy of the early American involvement in the Tube system.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那叫车，不叫车厢，美国早期地铁系统留下的旧称。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the act of sharing in the activities of a group

examination_example.sentence: The necessity of human <highlight>involvement</highlight> in the workplace.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类参与工作场所的必要性。

examination_example.sentence: It bans outsiders' <highlight>involvement</highlight> in the profession.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它禁止外人参与这一职业。

sense_info_list.en: a sense of concern with and curiosity about someone or something
emotional or personal association with someone

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the act of sharing in the activities of a group

examination_example.sentence: To affect behavioral change, what's most required is interaction and <highlight>involvement</highlight>—the human touch—and, naturally, processes that add value.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了影响行为的改变，最需要的是互动和参与，即人的接触，当然还有增加价值的过程。

sense_info_list.en: emotional or personal association with someone
a sense of concern with and curiosity about someone or something

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 卷入；牵连；参与；关联；牵扯
adj. 有牵扯的；有关联的；关系暧昧的；难懂的；深奥的；复杂的；棘手的

word_family.mean: v. 包括；包含；牵涉；卷入；使…经历；使…参与

sense_info_list.en: the act of sharing in the activities of a group

examination_example.sentence: There have been concerns around the sugar content of cereal and the food industry's <highlight>involvement</highlight> in pro-breakfast research — and even one claim from an academic that breakfast is "dangerous".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们也一直担心谷物中的糖分含量，以及食品行业参与的支持早餐的研究，甚至有学者声称，早餐是“危险的”。

sense_info_list.en: emotional or personal association with someone

examination_example.sentence: So it is more likely that poor health, not just family <highlight>involvement</highlight>, dampens spirits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，更可能的情况是，健康状况不佳，而不仅仅是家庭参与，会影响情绪。

sense_info_list.en: a sense of concern with and curiosity about someone or something
a connection of inclusion or containment
